columns.Performance_ID: The unique identifier for each performance event.
columns.Date: The date on which the performance takes place.
columns.Host: The name of the team hosting the performance.
columns.Location: The venue where the performance occurs.
columns.Attendance: The number of attendees present at the performance.

performance.table_description: The table tracks details of performance events and their attendance.

columns.Performance_ID: The unique identifier for each performance event attended.
columns.Member_ID: The unique identifier for each member attending the performance.
columns.Num_of_Pieces: The number of pieces a member participated in during the performance.

member_attendance.table_description: The table tracks attendance and participation details of members in performances.

columns.Member_ID: The unique identifier for each member of the group.
columns.Name: The full name of the member.
columns.Nationality: The country of origin of the member.
columns.Role: The instrument or position held by the member.

member.table_description: The table details each member's identity and role within the group.
